title: Phoenix Project Data Catalog
description: Defines the schemas for all core data assets used in the system, serving as the official data contract.

asset_data_schema.description: Schema for the daily OHLCV data for a single asset, stored in Parquet format.

Date.description: The timestamp for the data bar (Primary Index).

fused_ai_analysis_schema.description: Schema for the cached, fused AI analysis for a single asset on a single day.

data_assets.description: Cached daily price and volume data for each ticker in the asset universe. Stored in data_cache/asset_data_{ticker}_{hash}.parquet.
Cached daily AI analysis for each ticker. Stored in data_cache/asset_analysis_cache.json.
